doc.field: - Oper shr 26 cts vs 16 cts Oper net 948,000 vs 480,000 Revs 25.4 mln vs 19.9 mln NOTE: Excludes loss of 6.7 mln dlrs or 1.82 dlrs/shr vs gain of 453,000 dlrs or 15 cts from discontinued operations. 1985 also excludes extraordinary gain equal to 34 cts/shr. 1986 ended Dec 31 and 1985 ended Nov 30. In 1986, company changed fiscal year end to Dec 31.
